2.text: Sketch the details of the owl’s head.

3.text: Add more details to the owl’s head.

5.text: Continue with short strokes that follow the guiding lines and shape of the body.

6.text: Finish the drawing with important last touches.

8.text: Sketch the details of the owl’s head.

9.text: Add “guiding lines” for the body, feet, and wings.

10.text: Trace over the owl sketch with a darker brush to make the outline more neat and visible.

11.text: Make few short lines using a smaller brush to create a feather texture.

12.text: Select the colors you want for the owl.

13.text: Add shades and highlights to add depth to the drawing.

14.text: Finish the drawing by adding colors or other figures to the background.
